title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A Classic Italian pasta dish woth eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Simmer and add cream before serving.
